name: Kardok's Vampire Survivors Like Game
description:
There is 4 bosses. They are spawning at Level 3, 7, 15 and 25.

You can get 5 different weapons with 7 upgrades. You start with whip. There is some passive bonuses you can get.

When you get a reward of shield and some gold when you kill some amount of enemies. (At 50-150-300-500-750-1000..... the number keeps summed by 250)

You can move by W-A-S-D and arrows. I haven't added joystick support yet. You need to use Alt+F4 to exit.

There is no use of gold yet.

You can suggest me names for this game.
